oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The Eddy Arnold Show - #109 - Incomplete take
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: An incomplete take of the Eddy Arnold Show #109, produced and transcribed in Nashville, TN. by Brown Radio Productions. Featuring Eddy Arnold and the Tennessee Plowboys, the Willis Brothers, Roy Wiggins, host 'Pappy' Hal Horton, and guest Zeb Turner. Opening theme music, 'Cattle Call'; closing theme music, 'Boil Them Cabbage Down'.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Eddy Arnold; Tennessee Plowboys
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Hal Horton introduces the show (0:20) Opening theme / (0:55) Eddy Arnold says the opening statements / (1:12) Eddy Arnold performs "I'm Poor Folks All The Time" [incomplete]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Eddy Arnold Show (Radio program); Horton, Hal, -1948; Arnold, Eddy, 1918-2008; Tennessee Plowboys; Wiggins, Roy; Willis Brothers
